assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Excel Realty N Infra Limited engages in the infra, information technology (IT), business process outsourcing (BPO), and general trading activities in India. It operates through three segments: Infrastructure, BPO/IT Enabled Services, and General Trading. The company provides general trading and business process outsourcing services; and develops infrastructure facilities. It also offers customer care services, and inbound and outbound services, as well as handles the business relations of clients on their behalf. The company was formerly known as Excel Infoways Limited and changed its name to Excel Realty N Infra Limited in May 2015. Excel Realty N Infra Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Mrinal  Khurana
